import { Outlet, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Fragment, useContext } from 'react' import { UserContext } from '../../contexts/user.contexts' import { ReactComponent as CrownLogo } from '../../assets/crown.svg' import './navigation.styles.scss' const Navigation = () => { const { currentUser } = useContext(UserContext) return (
SHOP {currentUser ? SIGN OUT : SIGN IN }
) } export default Navigation
